desc: Kualitas do’a itu tergantung kepada bacaan do’a itu sendiri, kesungguhan, serta keikhlasan orang yang mengucapkannya.  Berikut adalah do’a-do’a yang bersumber dari Al-Qur’an. Semoga bermanfaat

data.arabic: رَبِّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَسْأَلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِي بِهِ عِلْمٌ ۖ وَإِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِي وَتَرْحَمْنِي أَكُنْ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
data.translation: Dia (Nuh) berkata: “Ya Rabbku, sungguh aku berlindung kepada-Mu untuk memohon kepada-Mu sesuatu yang aku tidak tahu akan hakikatnya. Jikalau Engkau tidak mengampuniku, dan (tidak) menaruh belas kasihan kepadaku, niscaya aku termasuk orang yang rugi.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, kami telah beriman, maka ampunilah kami dan berilah kami rahmat, Engkau adalah pemberi rahmat yang terbaik.

data.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, berilah ampunan dan (berilah) rahmat, Engkaulah pemberi rahmat yang terbaik.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَإِسْرَافَنَا فِي أَمْرِنَا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, ampunilah dosa-dosa kami dan tindakan-tindakan kami yang belebihan (dalam) urusan kami dan tetapkanlah pendirian kami, dan tolonglah kami terhadap orang-orang kafir

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, kami benar-benar beriman, maka ampunilah dosa-dosa kami dahulu, dan lindungilah kami dari azab Neraka

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّنَا سَمِعْنَا مُنَادِيًا يُنَادِي لِلْإِيمَانِ أَنْ آمِنُوا بِرَبِّكُمْ فَآمَنَّا ۚ رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ رَبَّنَا وَآتِنَا مَا وَعَدْتَنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخْزِنَا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخْلِفُ الْمِيعَادَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, sungguh kami mendengar orang yang menyeru kepada iman, (yaitu): 'Berimanlah kamu kepada Rabbmu,' maka kami pun beriman. Ya Rabb kami, ampunilah dosa-dosa kami dan hapuskanlah kesalahan-kesalahan kami, dan matikanlah kami beserta orang-orang yang berbakti(shalih). Ya Rabb kami, berilah kami apa yang telah Engkau janjikan kepada kami melalui Rasul-Rasul-Mu. Dan janganlah Engkau hinakan kami pada hari Kiamat. Sungguh, Engkau tidak pernah mengingkari janji.

data.arabic: رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, sungguh aku telah menzalimi diriku sendiri, maka ampunilah aku.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ ۖ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا ۚ أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, janganlah Engkau hukum kami jika kami lupa atau kami melakukan kesalahan. Ya Rabb kami, janganlah Engkau bebani kami dengan beban yang berat sebagaimana Engkau bebankan kepada orang-orang sebelum kami. Ya Rabb kami, janganlah Engkau pikulkan kepada kami apa yang tidak sanggup kami memikulnya. Maafkanlah kami, ampunilah kami, dan rahmatilah kami. Engkaulah pelindung kami, maka tolonglah kami menghadapi orang-orang kafir.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, kami telah menzhalimi diri kami sendiri. Jika Engkau tidak mengampuni kami dan memberi rahmat kepada kami, niscaya kami termasuk orang-orang yang rugi.

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ وَاجْعَلْ لِي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي الْآخِرِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنْ وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعِيمِ
data.translation: Ya Rabb-ku, berikanlah kepadaku ilmu dan masukkanlah aku ke dalam golongan orang-orang yang shalih, dan jadikanlah aku buah tutur yang baik bagi orang-orang (yang datang) kemudian, dan jadikanlah aku termasuk orang yang mewarisi surga yang penuh kenikmatan.

data.arabic: وَلَا تُخْزِنِي يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.translation: dan janganlah Engkau hinakan aku pada hari mereka dibangkitkan

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاكْتُبْنَا مَعَ الشَّاهِدِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, kami telah beriman, maka catatlah kami bersama orang-orang yang menjadi saksi (atas kebenaran al-Qur'an dan kenabian Muhammad)

prayer.title: Doa Agar Termasuk Golongan Orang-Orang Beriman

data.arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِي فَرْدًا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الْوَارِثِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, janganlah Engkau biarkan aku hidup seorang diri ( tanpa keturunan) dan Engkaulah ahli waris yang terbaik.

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, anugerahkanlah kepadaku (seorang anak) yang termasuk orang yang shalih

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, berilah aku keturunan yang baik dari sisi-Mu. Sesungguhnya Engkau Yang Maha Mendengar doa.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, anugerahkanlah kepada kami istri-istri kami dan keturunan kami sebagai penyenang hati (kami), dan jadikanlah kami pemimpin bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa

prayer.title: Doa Agar Diberikan Keturunan Yang Shalih

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, ampunilah aku dan kedua ibu bapakku dan semua orang yang beriman pada hari diadakan perhitungan (Hari Kiamat)

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَانِنَا الَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِالْإِيمَانِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌ رَحِيمٌ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, ampunilah kami dan saudara-saudara kami yang telah beriman lebih dahulu dari kami, dan janganlah Engkau tanamkan kedengkian ke dalam hati kami terhadap orang-orang yang beriman. Ya Rabb Kami, Sungguh, Engkau Maha Penyantun, Maha Penyayang.

data.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, ampunilah aku, ibu bapakku, dan siapa pun yang memasuki rumahku dengan beriman dan semua orang yang beriman laki-laki dan perempuan

prayer.title: Memohonkan Ampunan Bagi Kedua Orang Tua Dan Bagi Kaum Mukminin

data.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, jadikanlah aku dan anak cucuku orang yang tetap melaksanakan shalat, ya Rabb kami, perkenankanlah doaku.

prayer.title: Doa Memohon Ketetapan Bagi Diri Sendiri Dan Keluarga Agar Selalu Mendirikan Shalat

data.arabic: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, selamatkanlah aku dari orang-orang yang zalim itu.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, janganlah Engkau tempatkan kami bersama-sama orang-orang zalim itu

data.arabic: رَبِّ انْصُرْنِي عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, tolonglah aku (yakni dengan menimpakan azab) atas golongan yang berbuat kerusakan itu.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ …  وَتُبْ عَلَيْنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, terimalah (amal) dari kami. Sungguh, Engkaulah Yang Maha Mendengar, Maha Mengetahui ... dan terimalah taubat kami. Sungguh, Engkaulah Maha Penerima taubat, Maha Penyayang

prayer.title: Doa Agar Diterimanya Amal Ibadah Dan Taubat

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, hanya kepada Engkau kami bertawakkal dan hanya kepada Engkau kami bertaubat dan hanya kepada Engkaulah kami kembali

data.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
data.translation: Cukuplah Allah bagiku; tidak ada ilah selain Dia. Hanya kepada-Nya aku bertawakal, dan Dia adalah Rabb yang memiliki 'Arsy (singgasana) yang agung

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا رَبَّنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, jangan Engkau jadikan kami (sasaran) fitnah bagi orang-orang kafir. Dan ampunilah kami, ya Rabb kami. Sesungguhnya Engkau yang Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ  وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, janganlah Engkau jadikan kami (sasaran) fitnah bagi kaum yang zalim, dan selamatkanlah kami dengan rahmat-Mu dari orang-orang yang kafir

data.arabic: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, tambahkanlah ilmu kepadaku

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, sempurnakanlah untuk kami cahaya kami dan ampunilah kami; Sungguh, Engkau Mahakuasa atas segala sesuatu

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, berilah kami kebaikan di dunia dan kebaikan di akhirat, dan lindungilah kami dari azab Neraka

prayer.title: Doa Memohon Kebaikan Dunia Dan Akhirat

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, anugerahkanlah aku ilham untuk tetap mensyukuri nikmat-Mu yang telah Engkau anugerahkan kepadaku dan kepada kedua orangtuaku dan agar aku mengerjakan kebajikan yang Engkau ridhai; dan masukkanlah aku dengan rahmat-Mu ke dalam golongna hamba-hamba-Mu yang shalih

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي ۖ إِنِّي تُبْتُ إِلَيْكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, berilah aku petunjuk agar aku dapat mensyukuri nikmat-Mu yang telah Engkau limpahkan kepadaku dan kepada kedua orangtuaku dan agar aku dapat berbuat kebajikan yang Engkau ridhai; dan berilah aku kebaikan yang akan mengalir sampai kepada anak cucuku. Sesungguhnya aku bertaubat kepada Engkau dan sungguh, aku termasuk orang muslim

prayer.title: Doa Agar Dijadikan Hamba Yang Bersyukur

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, aku berlindung kepada Engkau dari bisikan-bisikan syaitan, dan aku berlindung (pula) kepada Engkau ya Rabbku, agar mereka tidak mendekati aku

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, jangan Engkau condongkan hati kami kepada kesesatan setelah Engkau telah berikan petunjuk kepada kami, dan karuniakanlah kepada kami rahmat dari sisi-Mu, karena sesungguhnya Engkau Maha Pemberi

prayer.title: Doa Agar Hati Ditetapkan Dalam Hidayah

data.arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: Tidak ada ilah yang berhak diibadahi selain Engkau, Mahasuci Engkau. Sungguh, aku ini termasuk orang-orang yang zhalim

data.arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
data.translation: Ya Rabbku, lapangkanlah dadaku, dan mudahkanlah untukku urusanku, dan lepaskanlah kekakuan dari lidahku, agar mereka mengerti perkataanku

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, Berikanlah rahmat kepada kami dari sisi-Mu dan sempurnakanlah petunjuk yang lurus bagi kami dalam urusan kami

prayer.title: Doa Agar Dilapangkan Hati Dan Dimudahkan Dalam Segala Urusan

data.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْ هَٰذَا الْبَلَدَ آمِنًا وَاجْنُبْنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَنْ نَعْبُدَ الْأَصْنَامَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb, jadikanlah negeri ini, negeri yang aman, dan jauhkanlah aku beserta anak cucuku agar tidak menyembah berhala

prayer.title: Doa Untuk Keamanan Negeri Dan Berlindung Dari Syirik

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا إِنَّهَا سَاءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, jauhkanlah azab Jahannam dari kami, karena sesungguhnya azab itu membuat kebinasaan yang kekal, sungguh, Jahannam itu seburuk-buruk tempat menetap dan tempat kediaman

data.arabic: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
data.translation: Cukuplah Allah (menjadi penolong) bagi kami dan Dia sebaik-baik pelindung

prayer.title: Doa Meminta Pertolongan Dan Perlindungan Dari Orang Kafir

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
data.translation: Ya Rabb kami, limpahkan kesabaran kepada kami dan matikanlah kami dalam keadaan muslim (berserah diri kepada-Mu)

prayer.title: Doa Mohon Kesabaran Dan Diwafatkan Dalam Keadaan Muslim

data.arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبِّي أَنْ يَهْدِيَنِي سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ
data.translation: Mudah-mudahan Rabbku memimpin aku ke jalan yang benar

prayer.title: Doa Agar Dibimbing Ke Jalan Yang Lurus

title: Doa di Qur'an

desc: Humans have a great need for dhikr, anytime and anywhere. If a servant is negligent from remembering Allah, He will regret it both in this dunya and the akhirah.

data.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
data.source: It was reported by Al-Hakim 1 / 562, Al-Albani graded it as authentic in Sahihut-Targhib wat-Tarhib 1/273, and traces it to An-Nasa'i and At-Tabarani.
data.translation:
There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and projects all that exist. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never encompass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
(Al-Baqarah: 255)

data.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ⦿اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ⦿لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ⦿وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ⦿
data.source: The Hadith was reported by Abu Dawud 4/322, and At-Tirmithi 5/567. See Al-Albani's Sahih At-Tirmithi 3/182.
data.translation:
Say: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
(Al-Ikhlas: 1-4)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ⦿مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ⦿
data.source: The Hadith was reported by Abu Dawud 4/322, and At-Tirmithi 5/567. See Al-Albani's Sahih At-Tirmithi 3/182.
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
(Al-Falaq: 1-5)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ⦿مَلِكِ النَّاسِ⦿إِلَهِ النَّاسِ⦿مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ⦿الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِالنَّاسِ⦿مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَ النَّاسِ⦿
data.source: Abu Dawud (5082), an-Nasa-i VIII/250 and at-Tirmidzi (3575), Ahmad V/312, Shahiih at-Tirmidzi (2829), Tuhfatul Ahwadzi (3646), Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/411 (649)
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the hearts of mankind, of jinns and men. 
(An-Naas: 1-6)

data.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ للهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ للهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهَا، وَأَعُوذُبِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهَا، رَبِّ أَعُوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُبِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
data.translation: We have ended another day and with it all dominion is Allah's. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Allah belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He is Able to do all things. My Lord, I ask You for the goodness of this day and of the days that come after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day and of the days that come after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell-fire , and from the punishment of the grave.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْـمَصِيْرُ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in al-Adabul Mufrad, this part was taken from al-Bukhari, at-Tirmidzi (3391), Abu Dawud (5068), Ahmad 11/354, Ibnu Majah (3868), Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (911)
data.translation: O Allah, You bring us the end of the day as You bring us its beginning, You bring us life and you bring us death, and to You is our fate.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّيْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِيْ وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوْءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوْءُ بِذَنْبِيْ فَاغْفِرْ لِيْ فَإِنَّهُ لاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ.
data.source: Al-Bukhari (6306 and 6323), Ahmad IV/122-125, an-Nasa-i VIII/279-280
data.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship but You. You created me and I am your slave. I keep Your covenant, and my pledge to You so far as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I admit to Your blessings upon me, and I admit to my misdeeds. Forgive me, for there is none who may forgive sins but You.

data.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصْرِي، لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ، وَالْفَقْرِ، وأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ القَبْرِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (539), Abu Dawud (5090), Ahmad V/42
data.translation:
O Allah, make me healthy in my body. O Allah, preserve for me my hearing. O Allah, preserve for me my sight. There is none worthy of worship but You .
O Allah , I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave . There is none worthy of worship but You.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَاْلآخِرَةِ، اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِيْنِيْ وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْلِيْ وَمَالِيْ اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِى وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِى. اَللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِيْ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِيْ، وَعَنْ يَمِيْنِيْ وَعَنْ شِمَالِيْ، وَمِنْ فَوْقِيْ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِيْ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in al-Adabul Mufrad, Abu Dawud (5074), Ibnu Majah (3871), al-Hakim 1/517-518, Shahiih al-Adabul Mufrad (912)
data.translation: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish . O Allah , guard me from what is in front of me and behind me , from my left , and from my right , and from above me . I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيْكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِيْ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِيْ سُوْءًا أَوْ أَجُرُّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ
data.source: At-Tirmidzi (3392) and Abu Dawud (5067), see Shahiih at-Tirmidzi (2071), Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (914)
data.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the evident , Maker of the heavens and the earth , Lord of everything and its Possessor , I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You . I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his helpers . (I seek refuge in You) from bringing evil upon my soul and from harming any Muslim.

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِى لاَ يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَىْءٌ فِى الأَرْضِ وَلاَ فِى السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
data.source: At-Tirmidzi (3388), Abu Dawud (5088), Ahmad (446 and 476), Tahqiq Ahmad Syakir and Ibnu Majah (3869), see Shahiih Ibni Majah (3120), al-Hakim 1/513, Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (513)
data.translation: In the Name of Allah, Who with His Name nothing can cause harm in the earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

data.arabic: رَضِيْتُ بِاللهِ رَبًّا، وَبِاْلإِسْلاَمِ دِيْنًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيًّا
data.source: Ahmad IV/337, Abu Dawud (5072), at-Tirmidzi (3389), Ibnu Majah (3870), an-Nasa-i in 'Amalul Yaum wal Lailah (4) and Ibnus Sunni (68), Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/415 (657), declared shahih by Imam al-Hakim in al-Mustadrak 1/518 and approved by Imam adz-Dzahabi
data.translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion and with Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) as my Prophet.

data.arabic: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْثُ، وَأَصْلِحْ لِيْ شَأْنِيْ كُلَّهُ وَلاَ تَكِلْنِيْ إِلَى نَفْسِيْ طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
data.source: An-Nasa-i 575, al-Bazzar 3107 and al-Hakim 1/545 and Ibnus Sunni 48, see Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib I/417 (661)
data.translation: O Ever Living One, O Eternal One, by Your mercy I call on You to set right all my affairs. Do not place me in charge of my soul even for the blinking of an eye (a moment)

data.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ اْلإِسْلاَمِ وَعَلَى كَلِمَةِ اْلإِخْلاَصِ، وَعَلَى دِيْنِ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ، وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ أَبِيْنَا إِبْرَاهِيْمَ، حَنِيْفًا مُسْلِمًا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
data.source: Ahmad III/406, 407, V/123, ad-Darimi II/292 and Ibnus Sunni in Amalul Yaum wal Lailah (34), Misykaatul Mashaabiih (2415), Shahiihal-Jaami'ish Shaghiir (4674)
data.translation: We end this day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright (in worshipping Allah), and a Muslim. He was not of those who worship others besides Allah.

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ
data.source: Abu Dawud (5077), Ibnu Majah (3867), Shahiih Jaami'ish Shaghiir (6418), Misykaatul Mashaabiih (2395), Shahiih at-Targhiib 1/414 (656)
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
data.source: Muslim (2691) and (2692), Syarh Muslim XVII/17-18, Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/413 (653).
data.translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him

data.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
data.source: Ahmad 11/290, an-Nasa-i in 'Amalul Yaum wal Lailah (590), Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/412 (652), Shahiih al-Jaami 'ish Shaghiir (6427)
data.translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

data.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
data.source: It was reported by Al-Hakim 1 / 562, Al-Albani graded it as authentic in Sahihut-Targhib wat-Tarhib 1/273, and traces it to An-Nasa'i and At-Tabarani.
data.translation:
There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and projects all that exist. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never encompass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
(Al-Baqarah: 255)

data.source: Abu Dawud (5082), an-Nasa-i VIII/250 and at-Tirmidzi (3575), Ahmad V/312, Shahiih at-Tirmidzi (2829), Tuhfatul Ahwadzi (3646), Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/411 (649)

Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the hearts of mankind, of jinns and men.
(An-Naas: 1-6)

data.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ. رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِيْ هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِيْ هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوْءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
data.translation: We have entered a new day and with it all dominion is Allah's. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Allah belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He is Able to do all things. My Lord, I ask You for the goodness of this day and of the days that come after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day and of the days that come after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell-fire , and from the punishment of the grave.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُوْرُ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in al-Adabul Mufrad, this part was taken from al-Bukhari, at-Tirmidzi (3391), Abu Dawud (5068), Ahmad 11/354, Ibnu Majah (3868), Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (911)
data.translation: O Allah , by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and and by You we die, and to You is the Final Return.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّيْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِيْ وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوْءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوْءُ بِذَنْبِيْ فَاغْفِرْ لِيْ فَإِنَّهُ لاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ.
data.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship but You. You created me and I am your slave. I keep Your covenant, and my pledge to You so far as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I admit to Your blessings upon me, and I admit to my misdeeds. Forgive me, for there is none who may forgive sins but You.

data.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصْرِي، لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ، وَالْفَقْرِ، وأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ القَبْرِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (539), Abu Dawud (5090), Ahmad V/42
data.translation:
O Allah, make me healthy in my body. O Allah, preserve for me my hearing. O Allah, preserve for me my sight. There is none worthy of worship but You .
O Allah , I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave . There is none worthy of worship but You.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَاْلآخِرَةِ، اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِيْنِيْ وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْلِيْ وَمَالِيْ اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِى وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِى. اَللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِيْ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِيْ، وَعَنْ يَمِيْنِيْ وَعَنْ شِمَالِيْ، وَمِنْ فَوْقِيْ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِيْ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in al-Adabul Mufrad, Abu Dawud (5074), Ibnu Majah (3871), al-Hakim 1/517-518, Shahiih al-Adabul Mufrad (912)
data.translation: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish . O Allah , guard me from what is in front of me and behind me , from my left , and from my right , and from above me . I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيْكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِيْ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِيْ سُوْءًا أَوْ أَجُرُّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ
data.source: At-Tirmidzi (3392) and Abu Dawud (5067), see Shahiih at-Tirmidzi (2071), Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (914)
data.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the evident , Maker of the heavens and the earth , Lord of everything and its Possessor , I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You . I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his helpers . (I seek refuge in You) from bringing evil upon my soul and from harming any Muslim.

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِى لاَ يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَىْءٌ فِى الأَرْضِ وَلاَ فِى السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
data.source: At-Tirmidzi (3388), Abu Dawud (5088), Ahmad (446 and 476), Tahqiq Ahmad Syakir and Ibnu Majah (3869), see Shahiih Ibni Majah (3120), al-Hakim 1/513, Shahiih al-Adabil Mufrad (513)
data.translation: In the Name of Allah, Who with His Name nothing can cause harm in the earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

data.arabic: رَضِيْتُ بِاللهِ رَبًّا، وَبِاْلإِسْلاَمِ دِيْنًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيًّا
data.source: Ahmad IV/337, Abu Dawud (5072), at-Tirmidzi (3389), Ibnu Majah (3870), an-Nasa-i in 'Amalul Yaum wal Lailah (4) and Ibnus Sunni (68), Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/415 (657), declared shahih by Imam al-Hakim in al-Mustadrak 1/518 and approved by Imam adz-Dzahabi
data.translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion and with Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) as my Prophet.

data.arabic: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْثُ، وَأَصْلِحْ لِيْ شَأْنِيْ كُلَّهُ وَلاَ تَكِلْنِيْ إِلَى نَفْسِيْ طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
data.source: An-Nasa-i (575), al-Bazzar (3107) and al-Hakim 1/545 and Ibnus Sunni (48), see Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib I/417 (661)
data.translation: O Ever Living One, O Eternal One, by Your mercy I call on You to set right all my affairs. Do not place me in charge of my soul even for the blinking of an eye (a moment)

data.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ اْلإِسْلاَمِ وَعَلَى كَلِمَةِ اْلإِخْلاَصِ، وَعَلَى دِيْنِ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ، وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ أَبِيْنَا إِبْرَاهِيْمَ، حَنِيْفًا مُسْلِمًا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
data.source: Ahmad III/406, 407, V/123, ad-Darimi II/292 and Ibnus Sunni in Amalul Yaum wal Lailah (34), Misykaatul Mashaabiih (2415), Shahiihal-Jaami'ish Shaghiir (4674)
data.translation: We have entered an new day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright (in worshipping Allah), and a Muslim. He was not of those who worship others besides Allah.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ: عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ، وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ، وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
data.translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
data.source: Ibn As-Sunni, (54), Ibn Majah (925). Its chain of transmission is good (Hasan), Ibn Al-Qayyim 2/375.
data.translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit, a good provision, and deeds that will be accepted.

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ
data.source: Abu Dawud (5077), Ibnu Majah (3867), Shahiih Jaami'ish Shaghiir (6418), Misykaatul Mashaabiih (2395), Shahiih at-Targhiib 1/414 (656)
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
data.source: Muslim (2691) and (2692), Syarh Muslim XVII/17-18, Shahiih at-Targhiib wat Tarhiib 1/413 (653).
data.translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him

data.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَيْهِ
data.source: Al-Bukhari/ Fathul Baari XI/101 and Muslim (2702)
data.translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to Him.

data.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ
data.translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلاَمُ، وَمِنْكَ السَّلاَمُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلاَلِ وَاْلإِكْرَامَِ
data.translation: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace . Blessed are You , O Owner of majesty and honor.

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ، اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَلاَ مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ، وَلاَ يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
data.source: HR. Bukhari no. 844 dan Muslim no. 593.
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is Able to do all things. O Allah, there is none who can withhold what You give, and none may give what You have withheld; and the might of the mighty person cannot benefit him against You.

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ. لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ، لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ، وَلاَ نَعْبُدُ إِلاَّ إِيَّاهُ، لَهُ النِّعْمَةُ وَلَهُ الْفَضْلُ وَلَهُ الثَّنَاءُ الْحَسَنُ، لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ مُخْلِصِيْنَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكَافِرُوْنَ
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things. There is no power and no might except by Allah . None has the right to be worshipped but Allah, and we do not worship any other besides Him . His is grace , and His is bounty and to Him belongs the most excellent praise. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah . (We are) sincere in making our religious devotion to Him, even though the disbelievers may dislike it.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
data.translation: Glory is to Allah

data.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
data.translation: All Praise is to Allah

data.arabic: اَللهُ أَكْبَرُ
data.translation: Allah is the Most Great

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرُ
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise . He brings life and He causes death , and He is Able to do all things.

data.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
data.source: An-Nasai in Al Kubro 9: 44. This hadith was graded as authentic by Ibnu Hibban as well as Ibn Hajar in Bulughul Maram.
data.translation:
There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and projects all that exist. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never encompass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
(Al-Baqarah: 255)

data.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ⦿اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ⦿لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ⦿وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ⦿
data.source: Abu Daud no. 1523 and An-Nasai no. 1337.
data.translation:
Say: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
(Al-Ikhlas: 1-4)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ⦿مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ⦿
data.source: Abu Daud no. 1523 and An-Nasai no. 1337.
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
(Al-Falaq: 1-5)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ⦿مَلِكِ النَّاسِ⦿إِلَهِ النَّاسِ⦿مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ⦿الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِالنَّاسِ⦿مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَ النَّاسِ⦿
data.source: Abu Daud no. 1523 and An-Nasai no. 1337.
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the hearts of mankind, of jinns and men.
(An-Naas: 1-6)

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
data.translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.

data.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ⦿اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ⦿لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ⦿وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ⦿
data.translation:
Say: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
(Al-Ikhlas: 1-4)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ⦿مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ⦿وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ⦿
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
(Al-Falaq: 1-5)

data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ⦿مَلِكِ النَّاسِ⦿إِلَهِ النَّاسِ⦿مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ⦿الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِالنَّاسِ⦿مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَ النَّاسِ⦿
data.translation:
Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the hearts of mankind, of jinns and men.
(An-Naas: 1-6)

data.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
data.translation:
There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and projects all that exist. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never encompass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
(Al-Baqarah: 255)

data.arabic: آَمَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ رَبِّهِ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ كُلٌّ آَمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَكُتُبِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِنْ رُسُلِهِ وَقَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ * لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلاَّ وُسْعَهَا لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: The Messenger believes in what has been send down to him from his Lord, and so do the believers. Each one believes in Allah, His Angels, His Books, and His Messengers. They say: "We make no distinction between any of His Messengers," and they say: "We hear, and we obey. (We seek) Your Forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the return." Allah burdens not a person beyond what he can bear. He gets reward for that (good) which he has earned, and he is punished for that (evil) which he has earned. Our Lord! Punish us not if we forget or fall into error. Our Lord! Lay not on us a burden like that which You did lay on those before us. Our Lord! Put not on us a burden greater than we have strength to bear. Pardon us and grant us forgiveness. Have mercy on us. You are our Protector, and help us against the disbelieving people.

data.arabic: بِاسْمِكَ رَبِّيْ وَضَعْتُ جَنْبِيْ، وَبِكَ أَرْفَعُهُ، فَإِنْ أَمْسَكْتَ نَفْسِيْ فَارْحَمْهَا، وَإِنْ أَرْسَلْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا بِمَا تَحْفَظُ بِهِ عِبَادَكَ الصَّالِحِيْنَ
data.translation: With Your Name my Lord, I lay myself down ; and with Your Name I rise . And if my soul You take , have mercy on it , and if You send it back then protect it as You protect Your righteous slaves.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ خَلَقْتَ نَفْسِيْ وَأَنْتَ تَوَفَّاهَا، لَكَ مَمَاتُهَا وَمَحْيَاهَا، إِنْ أَحْيَيْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا، وَإِنْ أَمَتَّهَا فَاغْفِرْ لَهَا. اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ
data.translation: O Allah, You have created my soul and You take it back. Unto You is its death and its life . If You give it life then protect it , and if You cause it to die then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You for strength.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ قِنِيْ عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
data.source: Tirmidzi no. 3398 and Abu Daud no. 5045.
data.translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.

data.arabic: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوْتُ وَأَحْيَا
data.translation: In Your Name , O Allah , I die and I live.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
data.translation: Glory Is To Allah

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
data.translation: All Praise Is To Allah

data.arabic: اللهُ أَكْبَرُ
data.translation: Allah Is The Most Great

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيْمِ، رَبَّنَا وَرَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، فَالِقَ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوَى، وَمُنْزِلَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَاْلإِنْجِيْلِ وَالْفُرْقَانِ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ أَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهِ. اَللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ اْلأَوَّلُ فَلَيْسَ قَبْلَكَ شَيْءٌ، وَأَنْتَ اْلآخِرُ فَلَيْسَ بَعْدَكَ شَيْءٌ، وَأَنْتَ الظَّاهِرُ فَلَيْسَ فَوْقَكَ شَيْءٌ، وَأَنْتَ الْبَاطِنُ فَلَيْسَ دُوْنَكَ شَيْءٌ، اِقْضِ عَنَّا الدَّيْنَ وَأَغْنِنَا مِنَ الْفَقْرِ
data.translation: O Allah! Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Magnificent Throne . Our Lord and the Lord of everything . Splitter of the grain and the date-stone , Revealer of the Torah and the Injeel and the Furqdn (the Qur'an), I seek refuge in You from the evil of everything that You shall seize by the forelock. O Allah You are the First and nothing has come before you, and You are the Last, and nothing may come after You. You are the Most High, nothing is above You and You are the Most Near and nothing is nearer than You. Remove our debts from us and enrich us against poverty.

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِيْ أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَكَفَانَا وَآوَانَا، فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لاَ كَافِيَ لَهُ وَلاَ مُؤْوِيَ
data.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink , sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيْكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِيْ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِيْ سُوْءًا أَوْ أَجُرُّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ
data.source: Tirmidzi no. 3392 and Abu Daud no. 5067.
data.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the evident , Maker of the heavens and the earth , Lord of everything and its Master, I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You . I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his helpers . (I seek refuge in You) from bringing evil upon my soul and from harming any Muslim.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِيْ إِلَيْكَ، وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِيْ إِلَيْكَ، وَوَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ إِلَيْكَ، وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِيْ إِلَيْكَ، رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ، لاَ مَلْجَأَ وَلاَ مَنْجَا مِنْكَ إِلاَّ إِلَيْكَ، آمَنْتُ بِكِتَابِكَ الَّذِيْ أَنْزَلْتَ وَبِنَبِيِّكَ الَّذِيْ أَرْسَلْتَ
data.translation: O Allah, I submit myself to You, entrust my affairs to You, turn my face to You, and lay myself down depending upon You , hoping in You and fearing You . There is no refuge , and no escape, except to You. I believe in Your Book (the Qur'an) that You revealed, and the Prophet whom You sent.

data.arabic: Read Surah Al-Mulk
Read Surah As-Sajdah

title: Book of Dzikir

desc: Everyone needs Dua, be it to protect one from a disaster or praying for something they want. Below are the list of Dua compiled from the Al-Qur’an and Sunnah.

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَاناَ بَعْـدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُوْرِ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in Fathul Bari: 11/113 and Muslim: 4/2083.
data.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَـرِيْكَ لَهُ. لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ. سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيْمِ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ ليِ
data.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without associate, to Him belongs sovereignty and praise and He is over all things wholly capable. How perfect Allah is, and all praise is for Allah, and none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, Allah is the greatest and there is no power nor might except with Allah, The Most High, The Supreme. O my Lord forgive me.

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي فِي جَسَدِيْ وَرَدَّ عَلَيَّ رُوْحِيْ وَأَذِنَ لِيْ بِذِكْرِهِ
data.translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.

data.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِيْ كَسَانِيْ هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ مِن ْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّيْ وَلاَ قُوَّةٍ
data.source: Every Sunan books, except Nasa’i, see; Irwaa’ul ghalil: 4/47
data.translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيْهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
data.source: Abu Dawud, At-Tirmidzi, Al-Baghawi and see Mukhtashar Syamaailit Tirmidzi, by Al-Albani, page: 47.
data.translation: YO Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it (i.e. the garment), I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.

data.arabic: تُبْلِي وَيُخْلِفُ اللهُ تَعَالَى
data.source: Abu Daud 4/41 and see also Shahih Abi Dawud, 2/760.
data.translation: May you wear it out and Allah replace it (with another).

data.arabic: اِلْبِسْ جَدِيْدًا، وَعِشْ حَمِيْدًا، وَمُتْ شَهِيْدًا
data.source: Ibnu Majah: 2/1178, Al-Baghawi: 12/41 also see Shahih Ibnu Majah: 2/275.
data.translation: Wear anew, live commendably and die a shaheed.

prayer.title: To someone wearing a new garment

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ
data.source: At-Tirmidzi: 2/505 and other Imam. See Irwa’ul Ghalil, 49 and Shahihul Jami’: 3/203.
data.translation: In the name of Allah.

data.arabic: (بِسْمِ اللهِ) اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
data.source: Al-Bukhari: 1/45 and Muslim: 1/283. the bismillah in the beginning is according to Said bin Mashur's report. See Fathul Baari: 1/244.
data.translation: (In the name of Allah). O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

data.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ
data.source: Abu Dawud, Ibnu Majah and Ahmad. See Irwa’ul Ghalil 1/122.
data.translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ
data.source: Abu Dawud, Ibnu Majah and Ahmad. See Irwa’ul Ghalil 1/122.
data.translation: In the name of Allah

data.arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُوْلُهُ
data.translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِيْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِيْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِيْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِيْنَ
data.translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَيْكَ
data.source: An-Nasa’i in ‘Amalul Yaumi wal Lailah, page; 173 also see Irwa’ul Ghalil: 1/135 and 2/94.
data.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ، وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ
data.source: Abu Dawud: 4/325, At-Tirmidzi: 5/490, also see Shahih At-Tirmidzi: 3/151.
data.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِلَّ، أَوْ أُضَلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ، أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِمَ، أَوْ أُظْلَمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ، أَوْ يُجْهَلَ عَلَيَّ
data.source: Every Sunan books, also see Shahih At-Tirmidzi: 3/152 and Shahih Ibnu Majah: 2/336.
data.translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا، ثُمَّ لِيُسَلِّمْ عَلَى أَهْلِهِ
data.source: Abu Dawud: 4/325, and Al-‘Allamah Ibnu Baaz said this hadith is graded hasan in Tuhfatul Akhyar, no. 28. in Kitab Shahih: “Whoever enters their home, then make Dzikir to Allah upon entering the home and before eating, the Syaithan will say (to his friends), "There will be no home or food tonight" Muslim, no. 2018.
data.translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِيْ قَلْبِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ لِسَانِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ سَمْعِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ بَصَرِيْ نُوْرًا، وَمِنْ فَوْقِيْ نُوْرًا، وَمِنْ تَحْتِيْ نُوْرًا، وَعَنْ يَمِيْنِيْ نُوْرًا، وَعَنْ شِمَالِيْ نُوْرًا، وَمِنْ أَمَامِيْ نُوْرًا، وَمِنْ خَلْفِيْ نُوْرًا، وَاجْعَلْ فِيْ نَفْسِيْ نُوْرًا، وَأَعْظِمْ لِيْ نُوْرًا، وَعَظِّمْ لِيْ نُوْرًا، وَاجْعَلْ لِيْ نُوْرًا، وَاجْعَلْنِيْ نُوْرًا، اَللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِنِيْ نُوْرًا، وَاجْعَلْ فِيْ عَصَبِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ لَحْمِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ دَمِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ شَعْرِيْ نُوْرًا، وَفِيْ بَشَرِيْ نُوْرًا
data.translation: O Allah, place light in my heart, and on my tongue light, and in my ears light and in my sight light, and above me light, and below me light, and to my right light, and to my left light, and before me light and behind me light. Place in my soul light. Magnify for me light, and amplify for me light. Make for me light and make me a light. O Allah, grant me light, and place light in my nerves, and in my body light and in my blood light and in my hair light and in my skin light.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِيْ نُوْرًا فِيْ قَبْرِيْ … ونُوْرًا فِيْ عِظَامِيْ
data.translation: O Allah, make for me a light in my grave... and a light in my bones.

data.arabic: وَزِدْنِيْ نُوْرًا، وَزِدْنِيْ نُوْرًا، وَزِدْنِيْ نُوْرًا
data.source: Bukhari in Al-Adab Al-Mufrad, no. 695, pg.258. Al-Albani graded this as Shahih, in Shahih Al-Adab Al-Mufrad, no. 536.
data.translation: Increase me in light, increase me in light, increase me in light

data.arabic: وَهَبْ لِيْ نُوْرًا عَلَى نُوْرٍ
data.translation: Grant me light upon light.

data.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِاللهِ الْعَظِيْمِ، وَبِوَجْهِهِ الْكَرِيْمِ، وَسُلْطَانِهِ الْقَدِيْمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
data.source: Abu Dawud, see Shahih Al-Jami’ no.4591
data.translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil.

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُوْلِ اللهِ اَللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِيْ أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
data.source: Ibnu As-Sunni no.88, Al-Albani graded this as “hasan”, Abu Dawud, see Shahih Al-Jami’ 1/528.
data.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِيْ أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
data.translation: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.

data.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُوْلِ اللهِ، اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، اَللَّهُمَّ اعْصِمْنِيْ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
data.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.

data.arabic: لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ
data.notes: [One repeats just as the mu-athin (one who calls to prayer) says, except when he says : ‘come to prayer, come to success’. Instead, one should say : ’Laa haula wala quwwata Illa billah']
data.translation: There is no might nor power except with Allah.

data.arabic: وَأَنَا أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُوْلُهُ، رَضِيْتُ بِاللهِ رَبًّا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ رَسُوْلاً، وَبِاْلإِسْلاَمِ دِيْنًا
data.notes: Recite after the muadzin recites the Syahadah
data.translation: And I too bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, and that Muhammad is His salve and Messenger. I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Muhammad as a Messenger and Islam as a religion.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ، وَالصَّلاَةِ الْقَائِمَةِ، آتِ مُحَمَّدًا الْوَسِيْلَةَ وَالْفَضِيْلَةَ، وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُوْدًا الَّذِيْ وَعَدْتَهُ
data.translation: O Allah, Owner of this perfect call and Owner of this prayer to be performed, bestow upon Muhammad al-waseelah and al-fadeelah and send him upon a praised platform which You have promised him.

data.notes: [One should also supplicate for himself during the time between the athan and the iqamah as supplication at such time is not rejected]
data.source: At-Tirmidzi, Abu Dawud and Ahmad. See Irwa’ul Ghalil: 1/262.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِيْ وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ، اَللَّهُمَّ نَقِّنِيْ مِنْ خَطَايَايَ، كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ اْلأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، اَللَّهُمَّ اغْسِلْنِيْ مِنْ خَطَايَايَ بِالثَّلْجِ وَالْمَاءِ وَالْبَرَدِ
data.translation: O Allah, set me apart from my sins as the East and the West are set apart from each other. O Allah, clean me from sins as the white garment is cleaned of dirt. O Allah, wash off my sins with water, snow, and hail.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلاَ إِلَـهَ غَيْرُكَ
data.source: The four Sunan books, also see Shahih At-Tirmidzi: 1/77 and Shahih Ibnu Majah: 1/135.
data.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You. Blessed be Your name, and lofty is Your position and none has the right to be worshipped except You.

data.arabic: وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِيْ فَطَرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضَ حَنِيْفًا وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ، إِنَّ صَلاَتِيْ، وَنُسُكِيْ، وَمَحْيَايَ، وَمَمَاتِيْ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ، لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ وَبِذَلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ. اَللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الْمَلِكُ   لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ. أَنْتَ رَبِّيْ وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِيْ وَاعْتَرَفْتُ بِذَنْبِيْ فَاغْفِرْلِيْ ذُنُوْبِيْ جَمِيْعًا إِنَّهُ لاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ. وَاهْدِنِيْ لأَحْسَنِ اْلأَخْلاَقِ لاَ يَهْدِيْ لأَحْسَنِهَا إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنِّيْ سَيِّئَهَا، لاَ يَصْرِفُ عَنِّيْ سَيِّئَهَا إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، لَبَّيْكَ وَسَعْدَيْكَ، وَالْخَيْرُ كُلُّهُ بِيَدَيْكَ، وَالشَّرُّ لَيْسَ إِلَيْكَ، أَنَا بِكَ وَإِلَيْكَ، تَبَارَكْتَ وَتَعَالَيْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَيْكَ
data.translation: I have turned my face sincerely towards He who has brought forth the heavens and the Earth and I am not of those who associate (others with Allah). Indeed my prayer, my sacrifice, my life and my death are for Allah, Lord of the worlds, no partner has He, with this I am commanded and I am of the Muslims. O Allah, You are the Sovereign, none has the right to be worshipped except You. You are my Lord and I am Your servant, I have wronged my own soul and have acknowledged my sin, so forgive me all my sins for no one forgives sins except You. Guide me to the best of characters for none can guide to it other than You, and deliver me from the worst of characters for none can deliver me from it other than You. Here I am, in answer to Your call, happy to serve you. All good is within Your hands and evil does not stem from You. I exist by your will and will return to you. Blessed and High are You, I seek Your forgiveness and repent unto You.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ جِبْرَائِيْلَ، وَمِيْكَائِيْلَ، وَإِسْرَافِيْلَ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ، عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ، أَنْتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِيْمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ. اِهْدِنِيْ لِمَا اخْتُلِفَ فِيْهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِكَ تَهْدِيْ مَنْ تَشَاءُ إِلَى صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيْمٍ
data.translation: O Allah, Lord of Jibra-eel, Meeka-eel and Israfeel (great angles), Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of the seen and the unseen. You are the arbitrator between Your servants in that which they have disputed. Guide me to the truth by Your leave, in that which they have differed, for verily You guide whom You will to a straight path.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ نُوْرُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فِيْهِنَّ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ قَيِّمُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فِيْهِنَّ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فِيْهِنَّ, وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ لَكَ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فِيْهِنَّ, وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ مَلِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَاْلأَرْضِ, وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ, أَنْتَ الْحَقُّ، وَوَعْدُكَ الْحَقُّ، وَقَوْلُكَ الْحَقُّ، وَلِقَاؤُكَ الْحَقُّ، وَالْجَنَّهُ حَقٌّ، وَالنَّارُ حَقٌّ، وَالنَّبِيُّوْنَ حَقٌّ، وَمُحَمَّدٌ ﷺ حَقٌّ، وَالسَّاعَةُ حَقٌّ, اَللَّهُمَّ لَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، وَعَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْتُ، وَبِكَ خَاصَمْتُ، وَإِلَيْكَ حَاكَمْتُ. فَاغْفِرْ لِيْ مَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَرْتُ وَمَا أَعْلَنْتُ, أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّرُ، لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ, أَنْتَ إِلَـهِيْ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
data.source: Al-Bukhari in Fathul Bari 3/3, 11/116, 13/371, 423, 465 and Muslim briefly reported in 1/532.
data.translation: O Allah, to You belongs all praise, You are the Light of the heavens and the Earth and all that is within them. To You belongs all praise, You are the Sustainer of the heavens and the Earth and all that is within them. To You belongs all praise. You are Lord of the heavens and the Earth and all that is within them. To You belongs all praise and the kingdom of the heavens and the Earth and all that is within them. To You belongs all praise, You are the King of the heavens and the Earth and to You belongs all praise. You are The Truth, Your promise is true, your Word is true, and the Day in which we will encounter You is true, the Garden of Paradise is true and the Fire is true, and the Prophets are true, Muhammad r is true and the Final Hour is true. O Allah, unto You I have submitted, and upon You I have relied, and in You I have believed, and to You I have turned in repentance, and over You I have disputed, and to You I have turned for judgment. So forgive me for what has come to pass of my sins and what will come to pass, and what I have hidden and what I have made public. You are Al-Muqaddim and Al-Mu-akhkhir. None has the right to be worshipped except You, You are my Deity, none has the right to be worshipped except You.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيْمِ
data.source: The sunan books and Imam Ahmad, see Shahih At-Tirmidzi:1/83.
data.translation: How perfect my Lord is, The Supreme.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ
data.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord and I praise You. O Allah, forgive me.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوْتِ وَاْلمَلَكُوْتِ وَالْكِبْرِيَاءِ وَالْعَظَمَةِ
data.source: Abu Dawud: 1/230, An-Nasai and Ahmad. Graded Hasan
data.translation: How perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.

data.arabic: سُبُّوْحٌ قُدُّوْسٌ، رَبُّ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ وَالرُّوْحِ
data.translation: Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh.

data.arabic: سَمِعَ اللهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ
data.translation: May Allah answer he who praises Him

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ، حَمْدًا كَثِيْرًا طَيِّبًا مُبَارَكًا فِيْهِ
data.translation: Our Lord, for You is all praise, an abundant beautiful blessed praise.

data.arabic: مِلْءَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمِلْءَ اْلأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا، وَمِلْءَ مَا شِئْتَ  مِنْ شَيْءٍ بَعْدُ. أَهْلَ الثَّنَاءِ وَالْمَجْدِ، أَحَقُّ مَا قَالَ الْعَبْدُ، وَكُلُّنَا لَكَ عَبْدٌ. اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَلاَ مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ، وَلاَ يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
data.translation: The heavens and the Earth and all between them abound with Your praises, and all that You will abounds with Your praises. O Possessor of praise and majesty, the truest thing a slave has said (of You) and we are all Your slaves. O Allah, none can prevent what You have willed to bestow and none can bestow what You have willed to prevent, and no wealth or majesty can benefit anyone, as from You is all wealth and majesty.

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ اْلأَعْلَى
data.source: The sunan books and Imam Ahmad. See Shahih At-Tirmidzi: 1/83.
data.translation: How perfect my Lord is, The Most High

data.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ
data.source: Bukhari and Muslim, see chapter Dua during Ruku'.
data.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord, and I praise You. O Allah, forgive me.

data.arabic: سُبُّوْحٌ قُدُّوْسٌ رَبُّ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ وَالرُّوْحِ
data.translation: Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh.

data.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ
data.source: Abu Dawud: 1/231, see Shahih Ibnu Majah: 1/148.
data.translation: My Lord forgive me, My Lord forgive me.

data.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ وَارْحَمْنِيْ وَاهْدِنِيْ وَاجْبُرْنِيْ وَعَافِنِيْ وَارْزُقْنِيْ وَارْفَعْنِي
data.source: Ashhabus Sunan, except An-Nasai. See Shahih At-Tirmidzi: 1/90 and Shahih Ibnu Majah: 1/148.
data.translation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy upon me, guide me, enrich me, give me health, grant me sustenance and raise my rank.

title: Book of Du'a

desc: The quality of a Dua depends on the Du’a and the Sincerity of the person saying it Here are some of the du’a sourced from the Qur’an.

data.arabic: رَبِّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَسْأَلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِي بِهِ عِلْمٌ ۖ وَإِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِي وَتَرْحَمْنِي أَكُنْ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
data.translation: Noah said: "O my Lord! I do seek refuge with Thee, lest I ask Thee for that of which I have no knowledge. And unless thou forgive me and have Mercy on me, I should indeed be lost!"

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! we believe; then do Thou forgive us, and have mercy upon us: For Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!

data.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! grant Thou forgiveness and mercy for Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَإِسْرَافَنَا فِي أَمْرِنَا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! Forgive us our sins and anything We may have done that transgressed our duty: Establish our feet firmly, and help us against those that resist Faith.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
data.translation: Our Lord! we have indeed believed: forgive us, then, our sins, and save us from the agony of the Fire;

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّنَا سَمِعْنَا مُنَادِيًا يُنَادِي لِلْإِيمَانِ أَنْ آمِنُوا بِرَبِّكُمْ فَآمَنَّا ۚ رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ رَبَّنَا وَآتِنَا مَا وَعَدْتَنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخْزِنَا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخْلِفُ الْمِيعَادَ
data.translation: Our Lord! we have heard the call of one calling (Us) to Faith, ´Believe ye in the Lord,´ and we have believed. Our Lord! Forgive us our sins, blot out from us our iniquities, and take to Thyself our souls in the company of the righteous. Our Lord! Grant us what Thou didst promise unto us through Thine messengers, and save us from shame on the Day of Judgment: For Thou never breakest Thy promise.

data.arabic: رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي
data.translation: O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul! Do Thou then forgive me! So (Allah) forgave him: for He is the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ ۖ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا ۚ أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! Condemn us not if we forget or fall into error; our Lord! Lay not on us a burden Like that which Thou didst lay on those before us; Our Lord! Lay not on us a burden greater than we have strength to bear. Blot out our sins, and grant us forgiveness. Have mercy on us. Thou art our Protector; Help us against those who stand against faith.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنْفُسَنَا وَإِنْ لَمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ وَاجْعَلْ لِي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي الْآخِرِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنْ وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعِيمِ
data.translation: O my Lord! bestow wisdom on me, and join me with the righteous;Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);Make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;

data.arabic: وَلَا تُخْزِنِي يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.translation: And let me not be in disgrace on the Day when (men) will be raised up;-

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آمَنَّا فَاكْتُبْنَا مَعَ الشَّاهِدِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! we believe; write us down among the witnesses.

prayer.title: Dua to be included among the faithful believers

data.arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِي فَرْدًا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الْوَارِثِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors.

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! Grant me a righteous (son)!

data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
data.translation: O my Lord! Grant unto me from Thee a progeny that is pure: for Thou art He that heareth prayer!

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
data.translation: Our Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
data.translation: O our Lord! cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me, my parents, and (all) Believers, on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَانِنَا الَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِالْإِيمَانِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌ رَحِيمٌ
data.translation: Our Lord! Forgive us, and our brethren who came before us into the Faith, and leave not, in our hearts, rancour (or sense of injury) against those who have believed. Our Lord! Thou art indeed Full of Kindness, Most Merciful.

data.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ
data.translation: O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women

prayer.title: Asking for Allah's forgiveness for our parents and believers

data.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
data.translation: O my Lord! make me one who establishes regular Prayer, and also (raise such) among my offspring O our Lord! and accept Thou my Prayer.

prayer.title: Dua for self and family to always establishes prayer

data.arabic: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! save me from people given to wrong-doing.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! send us not to the company of the wrong-doers.

data.arabic: رَبِّ انْصُرْنِي عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! help Thou me against people who do mischief!

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ …  وَتُبْ عَلَيْنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
data.translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing....and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
data.translation: Our Lord! in Thee do we trust, and to Thee do we turn in repentance: to Thee is (our) Final Goal.

data.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
data.translation: Allah sufficeth me: there is no god but He: On Him is my trust,- He the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme!

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا رَبَّنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
data.translation: Our Lord! Make us not a (test and) trial for the Unbelievers, but forgive us, our Lord! for Thou art the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ  وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
data.translation: In Allah do we put out trust. Our Lord! make us not a trial for those who practise oppression; And deliver us by Thy Mercy from those who reject (Thee).

data.arabic: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
data.translation: O my Lord! advance me in knowledge.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
data.translation: Our Lord! Perfect our Light for us, and grant us Forgiveness: for Thou hast power over all things.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
data.translation: Our Lord! Give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and defend us from the torment of the Fire!

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! so order me that I may be grateful for Thy favours, which thou hast bestowed on me and on my parents, and that I may work the righteousness that will please Thee: And admit me, by Thy Grace, to the ranks of Thy righteous Servants.

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي ۖ إِنِّي تُبْتُ إِلَيْكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
data.translation: O my Lord! Grant me that I may be grateful for Thy favour which Thou has bestowed upon me, and upon both my parents, and that I may work righteousness such as Thou mayest approve; and be gracious to me in my issue. Truly have I turned to Thee and truly do I bow (to Thee) in Islam.

prayer.title: Dua to be a grateful servant

data.arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَنْ يَحْضُرُونِ
data.translation: O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones. And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord! lest they should come near me.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
data.translation: Our Lord! (they say), Let not our hearts deviate now after Thou hast guided us, but grant us mercy from Thine own Presence; for Thou art the Grantor of bounties without measure.

prayer.title: Doa Agar Hati Ditetapkan Dalam Hidayah

data.arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
data.translation: There is no god but thou: glory to thee: I was indeed wrong!

data.arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
data.translation: O my Lord! expand me my breast; Ease my task for me; And remove the impediment from my speech, So they may understand what I say

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
data.translation: Our Lord! bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!

data.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْ هَٰذَا الْبَلَدَ آمِنًا وَاجْنُبْنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَنْ نَعْبُدَ الْأَصْنَامَ
data.translation: O my Lord! make this city one of peace and security: and preserve me and my sons from worshipping idols.

prayer.title: Protection for the city and from shikr

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا إِنَّهَا سَاءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
data.translation: Our Lord! avert from us the Wrath of Hell, for its Wrath is indeed an affliction grievous, Evil indeed is it as an abode, and as a place to rest in

data.arabic: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
data.translation: For us Allah sufficeth, and He is the best disposer of affairs.

data.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
data.translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience and constancy, and take our souls unto thee as Muslims (who bow to thy will)!

data.arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبِّي أَنْ يَهْدِيَنِي سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ
data.translation: I do hope that my Lord will show me the smooth and straight Path.

title: Du'a in Qur'an

desc: Setiap orang pasti membutuhkan do'a, baik untuk menolak sesuatu yang tidak disukai, ataupun mendatangkan sesuatu yang disenangi. Berikut adalah beberapa do'a yang kami ambil dari Al-Qur'an dan Sunnah.

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَاناَ بَعْـدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُوْرِ
data.source: HR. Bukhari dalam Fathul Bari: 11/113 dan Muslim: 4/2083.
data.translation: Segala puji bagi Allah Yang membangunkan kami setelah ditidurkan-Nya dan kepada-Nya kami dibangkitkan

data.arabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَـرِيْكَ لَهُ. لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ. سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيْمِ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ ليِ
data.translation: Tiada Tuhan selain Allah, Yang Maha Esa, tiada sekutu bagi-Nya. Bagi-Nya kerajaan dan pujian. Dia-lah Yang Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu. Maha suci Allah, segala puji bagi Allah, tiada Tuhan selain Allah, Allah Maha Besar, tiada daya dan kekuatan kecuali dengan pertolongan Allah yang Maha Tinggi dan Maha Agung. Ya Tuhanku, ampunilah dosaku

data.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي فِي جَسَدِيْ وَرَدَّ عَلَيَّ رُوْحِيْ وَأَذِنَ لِيْ بِذِكْرِهِ
data.translation: Segala puji bagi Allah Yang telah memberikan kesehatan kepada-ku, mengembalikan ruh dan merestuiku untuk berdzikir kepada-Nya

data.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِيْ كَسَانِيْ هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ مِن ْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّيْ وَلاَ قُوَّةٍ
data.source: HR. seluruh penyusun kitab sunan, kecuali Nasa’i, lihat; Irwaa’ul ghalil: 4/47
data.translation: Segala puji bagi Allah Yang telah memberikan pakaian ini kepadaku sebagai rezeki dari-pada-Nya tanpa daya dan kekuatan dari-ku.
